startHandshake._description: internal to config. should start the handshake process

restartHandshake._description: internal to config. should restart the handshake process

daemonHandshake._description: starting the connect process. Things that need to happen before we see the app should call daemonHandshakeWait

daemonHandshakeWait._description: subsystems that need to do things during boot need to call this to register that we should wait.
daemonHandshakeWait.name: string

filePickerError._description: Sent whenever the mobile file picker encounters an error.

logoutAndTryToLogInAs._description: Log out the current user, keeping secrets stored. Then prefill the username for provisioned another user to log in.

logoutHandshake._description: starting the logout process. Things that need to happen before we see the app should call logoutHandshakeWait

logoutHandshakeWait._description: subsystems that need to do things during logout need to call this to register that we should wait.
logoutHandshakeWait.name: string

installerRan._description: desktop only: the installer ran and we can start up

openAppSettings._description: mobile only: open the settings page

startupFirstIdle._description: emitted when we have some idle time after loading. useful to load thing but not slow down startup

loggedIn._description: Used internally to know we were logged in. if you want to react to being logged in likely you want bootstrapStatusLoaded

openAppStore._description: Open a link to the app store

remoteWindowWantsProps._description: remote electron window wants props sent

updateWindowState._description: main electron window wants to store its state

setWhatsNewLastSeenVersion._description: Set the latest version number that a user has seen from Gregor. This is used to set the badged state of the 'What's New' radio icon
